title: The Can’t-Miss Deals ELLE Editors Are Shopping Ahead of Prime Day
description: From glow-boosting skin care staples to breezy summer dresses.

html:
Faithfull the Brand Blair Mini Dress

“There is quite an impressive roster of summer dresses hidden on Amazon. I’m hoping to score a few new styles and enjoy the fast shipping this Prime Day.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

medicube PDRN Pink Peptide Serum

“Praised in our PDRN roundup, this vegan serum is my secret weapon for waking up with plump, glowing skin. With niacinamide, adenosine, and holy basil leaf extract, it calms redness, clears breakouts, and evens skin tone practically overnight. If you want smoother skin and the perfect base for makeup, this one’s a must-try.”—Laura Tarafa, commerce writer

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

'47 New York Yankees Hat

“Baseball season is officially here, so it’s time to break out my Yankees hat. There’s a reason this team is the top choice around the world—from models to celebrities and beyond. New York or nowhere!”—Claire Stern Milch, digital director

Lullasong Black Kitten Heel Flip Flops

“All the girls seem to be wearing kitten heel flip flops, so of course, I have to get on board.”—Meg Donohue, associate fashion commerce editor

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Waterpik Cordless Pearl Rechargeable Water Flosser

“I’ve reached the stage of adulting where I use Amazon Prime Day to stock up on grown-up essentials instead of buying yet another cute workout set I’ll never actually wear to the gym (I'm a big tee and shorts kind of girl). At the top of my list is a portable water flosser. I already house a bulkier Waterpik in my bathroom. Still, as someone who travels frequently—and flossing is an absolute must, regardless of the region—I love the ease of having a cordless, rechargeable flosser with precision and brush tips to tackle every crack and crevice.”—Nerisha Penrose, beauty commerce editor

Iunik Tea Tree Relief Serum

“I've been using this tea tree oil serum for years now, and Prime Day is the perfect excuse to stock up. It keeps my sensitive, acne-prone skin in-check, while providing a gorgeous glow.”—Emma Aerin Becker, associate beauty e-commerce writer

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Oura Oura Ring

“I’ve held out for as long as possible, but I think it’s time for me to finally give in and buy an Oura ring. I’m not usually competitive, but I even I want to brag about my sleep score!”—Meg Donohue

Kai kai Eau De Parfum

“As a gardenia enthusiast and someone who adores fresh, floral scents, I find this perfume simply divine. It has a light, fresh aroma that’s subtle, yet noticeable enough to earn me compliments all day long. It’s become one of my must-have fragrances for summer, and now that it’s 15 percent off, I’ll definitely be stocking up.”—Laura Tarafa

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Hero Cosmetics Mighty Patch The Original

“I’m honestly not sure how my skin survived without pimple patches. The Mighty Patch from Hero Cosmetics is my favorite for its magic pimple-erasing powers and ultra-invisible appearance—and now they’re 20 percent off.”—Emma Aerin Becker

Lumineux Whitening Starter Set

“If you’re anything like me and love to drink coffee and laugh as much, you can understand the sheer paranoia of living with stained teeth for eternity. Dramatic? Maybe, but I’ll do whatever I can to prevent it. This kit does the job as long as you’re consistent. I haven’t enjoyed other whitening kits because they make my teeth sensitive and tight, but Luminex’s version is comfortable and reliable.”—Nerisha Penrose

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Paula’s Choice Resist Youth-Extending Fluid

“Trust me, this is the SPF you’ll want in your beach bag all summer long. This formula is unlike anything I’ve tried—ultra-hydrating, soothing, and leaves no white cast. No eye-stinging, no greasy residue, just a lightweight liquid that melts in effortlessly. It leaves behind a soft, natural glow and wears beautifully under makeup, doubling as the perfect primer!”—Laura Tarafa

Apple AirPods Max

“I present to you my Prime Day purchase of 2024: the Apple Airpods Max. Since then, I have worn these headphones through enough long office days and extra-loud flights to officially deem them a top tech pick.”—Emma Aerin Becker

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Foam

“I’ve heard incredible things about the Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Foam. Now that it’s 30 percent off, I think it’s time to jump on the bandwagon.”—Emma Aerin Becker

Kristin Ess Kristin Ess Ceramic Curling Iron

“I recently purchased this ceramic curling iron from Kristin Ess, and now i actually enjoy curling my hair. My hair glides through the barrel so smoothly, and the included heat protectant ensures my styled strands are never fried.”—Emma Aerin Becker

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tower 28 SOS Rescue Spray

“My skin can’t survive a sweaty, muggy New York City summer without a hypochlorous acid spray. This one from Tower 28 calms and soothes and has antibacterial properties, everything my face needs after battling the elements in the dead of July.”—Madison Feller, digital deputy editor

Hatch Restore 3

“Although the Hatch alarm clock seems totally extra to me—I love being extra. Prime Day is the perfect excuse to finally pull the plug on this purchase I’ve been dreaming out. With an easy breezy wake-up call, I’m hoping this addition makes me a morning person.”—Emma Aerin Becker
